Title: This causes trouble! - Lessons from Several Heavy Liability Accidents
Publisher: Liaoning minzu chubanshe (辽宁民族出版社)
Notes: A set of safety production legal education wall charts was compiled and printed in 1987 to cooperate with the implementation of the instructions of the Party Central Committee, the National People's Congress Standing Committee and the State Council to overcome bureaucracy and strengthen safety production.Titled "He had only been on the job for a month" (他上岗才一个月), this poster recounts the death of Li XX. In 1986, 18-year old Li XX had been happy working in a foodstuffs factory. He worked on an imported bread conveyor belt machine and was bored. He thought up ways to play on the machine, going up and down; and crushed his skull.
